MfgPgmCpntFrcstFactOpptySchd.name: MfgPgmCpntFrcstFactOpptySchd
MfgPgmCpntFrcstFactOpptySchd.description: Represents a junction between the forecast and opportunity line item schedule objects, providing details on the relationship between forecast data and corresponding sales order schedules.

ManufacturingProgramComponentForecastFac.description: Represents information about the generated manufacturing program forecast records.

OpportunityLineItemSchedule.description: Represents information about the quantity, revenue distribution, and delivery dates for a particular OpportunityLineItem

OpportunityLineItem.description: Represents an opportunity line item associated with an Opportunity.

Opportunity.description: Represents an opportunity, which is a sale or pending deal.

Product.description: Represents Product on fact that is being converted to Oppotunity Line item
